title: All the Volumes including the final report of the Easter Attack to be tabled in Parliament today
content: All the volumes, including the final report of the Presidential Commission of Inquiry into the Easter attacks and related witness records, have been submitted to Parliament.The complete 88-volume report of the ‘Presidential Commission of Inquiry to Investigate and Inquire into and Report or Take Necessary Action on the Attacks on 21st April 2019’ was handed over to Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena by the Director-General of Legal Affairs of the Presidential Secretariat yesterday.
